ESV Q&A is a wiki for people to share their insights in the format of Q&A while they study the ESV Bible.

What are some guidelines to submit questions and answers?
No question is a dumb question, but if a question or an answer is inappropiate, it may be edited or deleted by others.
Please specify the source when an answer is quoted.

Where is ESV got loaded from?
Scripture taken from The Holy Bible, English Standard Version. Copyright ©2001 by Crossway Bibles, a publishing ministry of Good News Publishers. Used by permission. All rights reserved. Text provided by the Crossway Bibles Web Service.

What architect does this app use?
Client-side HTML5, CSS and Javascript. It's a single page app built with framework Angularjs and Twiitter Bootstrap. Icons from Glyphicons Free.

Who has developed this app?
